---

## If you must use a public issue:

**Before submitting:**
- [ ] This is NOT a detailed vulnerability with exploit code
- [ ] This is a general security concern or question
- [ ] I understand this repository is source-visible for inspection only
- [ ] I am NOT submitting this as a contribution or fix

**Description:**
<!-- Brief description of the security concern -->

**Affected Area:**
<!-- Which part of the codebase (general area only) -->

**Suggested Action:**
<!-- What should be reviewed or addressed? -->

---

**Note:** This repository does not accept pull requests. Do not submit a PR to fix security issues.
